mood.description: Set the assistant's mood [mood: bored, angry, lethargic] [duration: message, session, permanent]
mood.template: Call the setMood tool to set the mood to the mood and duration requested by the user. If the duration is not mentioned assume session.

personality.template: Call the appropriate personality management tool based on the user's request. Supports: create (new personality), edit (modify active), show (--all for full file), list (all personalities), switch <name> (change active), and reset (--name <name> to remove specific, or --confirm to reset all).
